summary: This is mod for craftable potions, but instead of normal requires as ingredients, it requires gold. Actually you don\'t craft potion, you buy it.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b]Version 1.2[/b][/center]

New potion added:

Potion of Cure Disease	- Cure Disease 100 pts.
Deadly Magicka Poison	- Damage Magicka 130 pts.
Deadly Stamina Poison	- Damage Stamina 130 pts.
Elixir of Health - Fortify Health 100 pts for 60 secs.
Elixir of Resist Fire - Resist Fire 50 pts for 60 secs.
Elixir of Resist Cold - Resist Frost 50 pts for 60 secs.
Elixir of Resist Magic - Resist Magic 25 pts for 60 secs.
Elixir of Resist Shock - Resist Shock 50 pts for 60 secs.
Potion of Plentiful Healing - Restore Health 75 pts.
Potion of Plentiful Magicka - Restore Magicka 75 pts.
Potion of Plentiful Stamina - Restore Stamina 75 pts.
Deadly Aversion to Fire	 - Weakness to Fire 100 pts for 30 secs.
Deadly Aversion to Frost - Weakness to Frost 100 pts for 30 secs.
Deadly Aversion to Magic - Weakness to Magic 100 pts for 30 secs.
Deadly Aversion to Shock - Weakness to Shock 100 pts for 30 secs.
Deadly Paralysis Poison	 - Paralysis for 15 secs.
Elixir of Waterbreathing - Waterbreathing for 60 secs.
Esbern\'s Potion - Esbern\'s Potion 1 pt.
Deadly Fear Poison - Fear 23 pts for 30 secs.



--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
I make this mod only for my personal use, but i decided to upload it here, if someone want something like that. The mod allow you to \"craft\" potion with gold, instead of requiring ingredients, and its NOT affected by alchemy level. Now contains only for more valuable potions, but you can make request for other potions, or changing the prices. They can be crafted from Cooking Pot, in MISC section. 

List with potions:
**********************************************************************************************
Potion Of Extreme Healing - restore health 150pts.
Potion Of Extreme Magicka - restore magicka 150pts.
Potion Of Extreme Stamina - restore stamina 150pts.   
Potion Of Ultimate Healing - completely restore health 
Potion Of Ultimate Magicka - completely restore magicka 
Potion Of Ultimate Stamina - completely restore stamina 
Philter Of Health - fortify health 80pts. for 60secs.
Philter Of Extra Magicka - fortify magicka 80pts. for 60secs.
Philter Of Enhanced Stamina - fortify stamina 80pts. for 60secs.
Elixir Of True Shot - Fortify Marksman 50 pts for 60 secs.
Elixir Of Strength - Fortify Carry Weight 60 pts for 300 secs.
Elixir of Pickpocketing - Fortify Pickpocket 50 pts for 60 secs.
Potion of Prolonged Invisibility - Invisibility for 50 secs.
Prime Elixir of Escape - Invisibility for 60 secs.  Restore Health 150 pts.
Blacksmith\'s Philter - Fortify Smithing 50 pts for 30 secs.
Enchanter\'s Elixir - Fortify Enchanting 25 pts for 60 secs.
Deadly Poison - Damage Health 65 pts.
**************************************************************************************************
Instalation: 

Just put the .esp file in Skyrim data folder.
